message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $1000000. Would you be willing to consider that?

I appreciate your interest in the product, and I'm glad we're having this conversation. However, I have to consider the value I've put into this product, and I'm not sure I can go as low as $1000000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1100000, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $1050000?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but I'd like to propose a slight adjustment to make it more appealing. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1075000, but I'll throw in some additional perks and support that will make the value even greater.

I'm still a bit hesitant about the price, but I'm willing to consider your offer. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $1080000, and include the additional perks and support you mentioned?

I appreciate your willingness to consider the additional perks and support. I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $1080000. I'm willing to make one final concession and sell the product to you for $1090000, and I'll throw in some extra goodies to sweeten the deal.
